products.title: DELL EMC ENTERPRISE STORAGE ANALYTICS FOR VROPS
products.desc: Dell EMC Enterprise Storage Analytics (ESA) for vROps solution provides a single, end-to-end view of virtualized infrastructures (servers to storage) powered by the VMware vRealize Operations Manager analytics engine. Dell EMC ESA for vROps delivers actionable performance analysis and proactively facilitates increased insight into storage resource pools to help detect capacity and performance issues so they can be corrected before they cause a major impact. Dell EMC ESA for vROps provides increased visibility, metrics and a rich collection of storage analytics for Avamar, Isilon, EMC RecoverPoint for Virtual Machines, ScaleIO, Unity, Unity/VSA, VNX, VNXe, VMAX3, VMAX All Flash, PowerMax, VPLEX and XtremIO infrastructures in virtual or physical environments.

products.title: Amazon RDS Management Pack from Blue Medora
products.desc:
From insight into capacity for database connections to access to key database metrics, the Blue Medora Amazon RDS Management Pack for vRealize Operations offers end-to-end visibility across Amazon RDS resources to simplify troubleshooting, reduce mean-time-to-innocence and optimize performance.
The management pack offers insight into key metrics, including network utilization, storage IOPS, storage latency and disk queue length. In addition, a series of out-of-the-box reports and dashboards ensure that administrators have key insight into CPU, memory and storage to optimize Amazon infrastructure beyond RDS instances.

products.title: ENTERPRISE VA MAX - LOAD BALANCER
products.desc:
Full Layer 4-7 Functionality Application Delivery Controller (ADC)
The virtual appliance version of our software is almost identical to the hardware appliance, including all the same great features. Some customers use our virtual appliance to load balance VMware Horizon View. The Loadbalancer.org Enterprise VA MAX has been reviewed by Microsoft to meet Exchange Server 2016 requirements.

products.title: HPE ONEVIEW FOR VMWARE VREALIZE OPERATIONS
products.desc: The HPE OneView integration with vRealize Operations provides proactive monitoring for performance, health and capacity. HPE OneView for VMware vRealize Operations uncovers critical trend changes and includes dashboards that facilitate the identification of root cause problems and impacted resources across your converged infrastructure.

products.title: NETAPP SOLUTION FOR VMWARE CLOUD
products.desc: The NetApp® solution for VMware® Private Cloud, available as a NetApp Verified Architecture, combines innovative NetApp and VMware technologies and best practices, enabling enterprises and service providers to rapidly deploy an integrated cloud solution built on a shared virtualized infrastructure.

products.title: VSTAC VDI APPLIANCE
products.desc: Pivot3 delivers radically simplified and integrated shared storage and virtual servers in a simple, scalable appliance model. Pivot3 vSTAC VDI appliances provide an enterprise-class virtual desktop infrastructure for VMware View with high performance, high availability and no single point of failure. Pivot3 vSTAC VDI arrays operate as true shared resource pools. As vSTAC VDI appliances are “stacked” together, the system dynamically aggregates, load-balances and optimizes shared storage, compute and network resources to ensure optimal desktop performance. A Pivot3 vSTAC VDI array is designed to withstand end-to-end failures; from desktops to disks to appliances.
